author: Staff Writer - Unlimited Digital Access
title: Houston Astros at New York Yankees odds, picks and predictions
text: Houston Astros at New York Yankees odds, picks and predictions The Houston Astros (12-22) and New York Yankees (23-13) meet Tuesday, as they open a 3-game series in the Bronx. First pitch from Yankee Stadium is scheduled for 7:05 p.m. ET (TBS). Let's analyze [FanDuel Sportsbook's](https://wlfanduel.adsrv.eacdn.com/C.ashx?btag=a_27628b_2436c_&affid=11104&siteid=27628&adid=2436&c=) lines around the Astros vs. Yankeesodds and make our expert [MLB picks and predictions](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/category/mlb-odds-lines-spreads-picks-predictions/) for the best bets. Season series: Yankees lead 4-0 Houston got off to an awful start this season, one jumpstarted by the Astros getting swept at home by New York in a season-opening 4-game set. They had gone 5-1 from April 27-May 3 but then dropped back-to-back games to the Seattle Mariners Saturday and Sunday. The Yankees are coming off a weekend sweep of the Detroit Tigers. Despite some intermittent slumps of late, New York is 6-3 with a plus-19 run differential since April 27. Astros at Yankees projected starters RHP Justin Verlander vs. RHP Luis Gil Verlander (1-0, 2.08 ERA) is tabbed for his 4th start. He has a 1.15 WHIP, 3.6 BB/9 and 6.8 K/9 in 17 1/3 innings. - Last outing: No-decision, 7 IP, 2 ER, 6 H, 3 BB, 2 K in 3-2 loss vs. Cleveland Guardians Wednesday - Career vs. Yankees: 10-9, 3.41 ERA (171 1/3 IP, 65 ER), 160 H, 50 BB, 157 K in 27 starts Gil (2-1, 3.19 ERA) is making his 7th start. He has a 1.19 WHIP, 5.8 BB/9 and 11.6 K/9 in 31 innings. - Last outing: Win, 6 1/3 IP, 0 ER, 2 H, 1 BB, 5 K in 2-0 win at Baltimore Orioles Wednesday - Has never faced Astros before - Has lived dangerously with a low rate of 1st-pitch strikes, which has fed into the high walk rate; a .224 batting average on balls in play has been his salvation Win your fantasy baseball league with BaseballHQ.com. For decades, BHQ has been helping players just like you win! BHQ offers Draft Prep and full-season subscriptions. [Sign up today and start winning](https://baseballhq.com/subscribe)! Astros at Yankees odds Provided by [FanDuel Sportsbook](https://wlfanduel.adsrv.eacdn.com/C.ashx?btag=a_27628b_2436c_&affid=11104&siteid=27628&adid=2436&c=); access [USA TODAY Sports Scores and Sports Betting Odds hub](https://sportsdata.usatoday.com/baseball/mlb/scores) for a full list. Lines last updated Monday at 9:25 p.m. ET. - Moneyline: Astros +100 (bet $100 to win $100) | Yankees -118 (bet $118 to win $100) - Run line (RL)/Against the spread (ATS): Astros -1.5 (+162) | Yankees +1.5 (-196) - Over/Under (O/U): 8 (O: -115 | U: -105) Astros at Yankees picks and predictions Prediction Astros 5, Yankees 4 [Moneyline](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/2019/07/08/betting-101-what-is-a-moneyline-bet-in-sports-betting/) The ASTROS (+100) are 4-1 across their last 5 series lid-lifters; the Yanks are 1-3 in their last 4. Gil's control is too much of an issue to make him a likable play against a good Houston offense that does not strike out much. Dating back to last season, the Astros have lost 7 in a row to New York. All 7 of those games have been in Houston; the Astros took 2 of 3 from the Yankees last time they were in the Bronx (Aug. 4-6). Per ESPN, current New York batters own an aggregate .558 OPS against Verlander. The veteran righty is backed by an Astros relief corps that got a much-needed off day Monday. And figure those bullpens -- a New York strength and Houston weakness on paper -- as being way more even in talent and in analytical production. BACK THE ASTROS (+100). [Run line/Against the spread](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/2019/07/12/sports-betting-101-betting-the-spread/) Better relative value can be found on the ML: PASS. [Over/Under](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/2019/07/11/betting-101-the-over-under/) The Under went 3-0-1 in the earlier series in Houston. Look for some pushback by the bats in this one. There is some fade-Yankees-pitching lean snowballing with play-the-Astros-offense lean. TAKE THE OVER 8 (-115). Play our free daily [Pickâ€™em Challenge](https://dailyticket.usatoday.com/) and win!
